item.title: Isolation Gown
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
Specifications
  • 40 gsm spunbond standard or as requested
  • White and blue colour
  • One size fits all
  • Elastic cuffs
  • Comply with EN 14683, CE marking, ISO 9001 and 14001
item.content:encoded:
Isolation gown is made of Polypropylene Spunbond nonwoven fabric as lightweight material provides comfort. The isolation gown comes with elastic cuffs and neck/ waist ties to remain securely in place for extra protection.
This gown widely used in hospitals, clinlic and laboratory environment.

Packing
1 pc per small bag
50 big bags per carton

Specifications

  • 40 gsm spunbond standard or as requested
  • White and blue colour
  • One size fits all
  • Elastic cuffs
  • Comply with EN 14683, CE marking, ISO 9001 and 14001

item.title: SMMS Surgical Gown
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
Specifications - SMMS Standard surgical gown
  • 45/50/55 grams SMS/SMMS
  • Knitted cuffs with soft fabric for wrist comfort
  • 4 pcs of belts for tie up around the wrist
  • Special folding way with 1 pc of paper towel and paper sheet wrapped in sterilization package
item.content:encoded:
Surgical gown is made of 45 / 50 / 55 gsm SMS Nonwoven fabric to give excellent protection comfortable wear for medical personnel.
Treated with moisture repellent the fabric assure medical professional wonderful protection from bacteria infections and fluids.

Specifications
– SMMS Standard surgical gown

  • 45/50/55 grams SMS/SMMS
  • Knitted cuffs with soft fabric for wrist comfort
  • 4 pcs of belts for tie up around the wrist
  • Special folding way with 1 pc of paper towel and paper sheet wrapped in sterilization package

– SMMS Reinforced surgical gown

  • PP+PE Reinforcement in the front and sleeves
  • Resist to blood, oil and alcohol effeciently
  • Comply with EN 14683, CE marking, ISO 9001 and 14001

Packing
1 pc per small bag
20 big bags per carton
